name: UNOS_CLIN_INFO_5
description: Additional information reported to the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) for each of the registry records or forms.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: UNOS_TXP_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the patient's transplant procedure took place.

columns.name: UNOS_TXP_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the transplant procedure took place.

columns.name: UNOS_LK_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the left kidney arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_LK_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the left kidney arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_LK_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the left kidney check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_RK_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the right kidney arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_RK_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the right kidney arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_RK_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the right kidney check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_BK_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the en bloc kidneys arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_BK_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the en bloc kidneys arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_BK_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the en bloc kidneys check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_P_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the pancreas arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_P_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the pancreas arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_P_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the pancreas check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_L_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the liver arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_L_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the liver arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_L_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the liver check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_H_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the heart arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_H_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the heart arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_H_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the heart check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_LL_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the left lung arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_LL_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the left lung arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_LL_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the left lung check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_RL_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the right lung arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_RL_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the right lung arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_RL_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the right lung check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_BL_CHKIN_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the en bloc lungs arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_BL_CHKIN_TZ_C_NAME
columns.description: The time zone in which the en bloc lungs arrived at the transplant hospital.

columns.name: UNOS_BL_CHKIN_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the en bloc lungs check-in date and time is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_KI_FAIL_TRR_C_NAME
columns.description: The primary reason for the transplant patient's kidney graft failure for TRFs. Submitted to UNOS for field name grf_fail_cause_ty.
